slides.title: Welcome to OuiiSpeak
slides.html: Welcome! OuiiSpeak helps you learn English through interactive lessons.

slides.title: How OuiiSpeak Works
slides.html: Each lesson contains slides with text, practice exercises, and notes. Use the arrow buttons to navigate.

slides.title: Taking Notes
slides.html: You can save notes at any time to track your learning. Notes are saved automatically.

slides.title: Practice Makes Perfect
slides.html: Complete exercises and practice activities to reinforce what you learn.

slides.title: Ready to Begin?
slides.html: When you're ready, head to your first lesson to start learning English!
